wikipedia_page.main: Martha Elizabeth Newton (1941 - 2020) was a UK bryologist and botanist, specialising in cytology and field surveying.

response: * Martha Elizabeth Newton (1941 - 2020), British bryologist and botanist
* Martha Elizabeth Newton, bryologist and cytologist

The academic journal Transactions of the British Bryological Society was founded in 1947. E.C. Wallace was secretary 1948 - 1969. Martha Elizabeth Newton was general secretary from 1989 - 1999, having previously been meetings secretary from 1980 until 1988.
